filter-itk.name: itk::watershed::Segmenter
filter-itk.description: This filter implements the first step in the N-d watershed segmentation algorithm. It produces a segmented, labeled image from a scalar-valued image input. This filter is used in conjunction with WatershedSegmentTreeGenerator and WatershedRelabeler to produce a final segmented image volume. See itk::WatershedImageFilter for an overview of the entire algorithm and notes on the terminology used in describing it.
